description: This file defines the 'Product' entity class within a Java-based backend application, utilizing JPA annotations for ORM mapping. The class includes fields for id, name, price, and quantity, along with corresponding getters and setters, and validation constraints.

classes.name: Product
classes.description: JPA entity representing a product in the catalog. Contains fields for id, name, price, and quantity, with validation constraints and standard getters and setters.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the product ID, typically assigned by the database.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the product.

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Sets the name of the product.
